response.overview: A widowed field mouse must move her family -- including an ailing son -- to escape a farmer's plow. Aided by a crow and a pack of superintelligent, escaped lab rats, the brave mother struggles to transplant her home to firmer ground.
response.tagline: Right before your eyes, and beyond your wildest dreams.
response.title: The Secret of NIMH

titles.title: Brisby et le secret de Nimh
Mrs. Brisby und das Geheimnis von NIMH

release_dates.note: Eureka The Masters of Cinema Series  Blu-ray

results.name: "In the beginning we were ordinary street rats"
